channel.title: Aalto Dictionary of Machine Learning - Updates
channel.description: Updates to the Aalto Dictionary of Machine Learning: new terms, revisions, and figures Current coverage: 451 terms (Core ML 298 · math 140 · regulation 7 · reinflearning 6).

item.title: New term: Soft Label
item.description: We added the term Soft Label to the Aalto Dictionary of ML. It covers probabilistic labels, uncertainty, and knowledge distillation.
